bug.author: brollb
bug.summary: Filter out additional Job attributes from UI
bug.description:
There are a couple new attributes that should be filtered out of the execution UI: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4982789/66523069-9d903f80-eab4-11e9-91e2-a614e0abc88e.png></denchmark-link>
These were introduced in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepforge-dev/deepforge/pull/1227>#1227</denchmark-link>
